Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION
REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Increases the in-person appearance requirements for level two sex offenders
Summary: Increases the in-person appearance requirements for level two sex offenders from every three years to every year.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, in relation to in-person appearance requirements for level two sex offenders
